original_text: Aaron must give the offerings to God. He must give them for his family and he must give them for his servants. He must give them for all the people. Nobody can go into the Tent of Meeting while Aaron is in the Most Holy Place. He must be alone when he goes in. And he must be alone until he comes out. He must be alone when he gives the offerings to God. Those offerings make atonement for himself, for his family and for all Israel's people.
korean_text: 그가 지성소에 속죄하러 들어가서 자기와 그의 집안과 이스라엘 온 회중을 위하여 속죄하고 나오기까지는 누구든지 회막에 있지 못할 것이며

sentences.original_text: Aaron must give the offerings to God
He must give them for his family
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 가족을 위해 그것들을 드려야 합니다

sentences.original_text: and he must give them for his servants
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 자기 종들을 위해 그것들을 드려야 합니다

sentences.original_text: He must give them for all the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모든 백성을 위해 그것들을 드려야 합니다

sentences.original_text: Nobody can go into the Tent of Meeting
while Aaron is in the Most Holy Place
He must be alone when he goes in
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 들어갈 때 혼자 있어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: And he must be alone until he comes out
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 나올 때까지 혼자 있어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: He must be alone when he gives the offerings to God
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 하나님께 제물을 드릴 때 혼자 있어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: Those offerings make atonement for himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그 제물들은 그 자신을 위한 속죄를 이룹니다
